QuestData.Title: Creating the Ink
QuestData.Description: We're going to need a way to create an artificial nexus at your tower.$B$BI know where we can get what we need, but it's heavily protected. We don't have the firepower to just waltz in the front door.$B$BI have a plan - a scroll of mass teleportation.$B$BThe fungal giants and spore creatures down below are covered in pustules filled with an oily substance. If we gather enough of the oil I can craft a makeshift ink substitute for the scroll.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Pulsating Pustules from Sporebats and Fungal Giants in Zangarra.
QuestData.RewardText: These pustules are sizzling with energy. They'll do nicely.
